title: Star Guadian Quinn skin concept by NOOR SALEH
body:
Here is the image of the skin 
https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/008/974/020/large/noor-saleh-2.jpg?1516394486
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/008/974/021/large/noor-saleh-3.jpg?1516394488

Credit goes to the artist, NOOR SALEH, 2D Concept Artist
https://www.artstation.com/noorsaleh-0

replies.body: No no NO no NO NO NOOOOOOO if this skin is made i swear to every god that exists, i will play {{champion:157}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3080}} {{item:3095}}  against her every dam time and make your life miserable.

> [{quoted}](name=Snarf of thunder,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-02T01:01:49.356+0000)
>
> No no NO no NO NO NOOOOOOO if this skin is made i swear to every god that exists, i will play {{champion:157}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3080}} {{item:3095}}  against her every dam time and make your life miserable.

You have really no reason to be like that.
It's not too late to save him. He still has hope, mere, but still.
Why would {{item:3095}} + {{item:3072}} be more cancerous than {{item:3812}} + {{item:3046}} ?
#thighs

So normally, I haven’t been the biggest fan of a star guardian Quinn, cause I want a more serious badass skin for her.

But I’d buy this in a heartbeat. It’s so pretty! {{sticker:sg-lux}}

> [{quoted}](name=AvantelWings,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-02T00:13:29.954+0000)
>
> So normally, I haven’t been the biggest fan of a star guardian Quinn, cause I want a more serious badass skin for her.
> 
> But I’d buy this in a heartbeat. It’s so pretty! {{sticker:sg-lux}}

I know right ! I love the long brown hair and the clothes! It's well made by the artist.

That's so cute. I don't play Quinn, but I would have to buy that Quinn Star Guardian skin. My only complain is the legs. I would prefer if her legs had either both thigh thighs or none.  I never been a fan of non symmetrical clothing except on a slit dresses.

YES PLEASE RIOT!!!!!  PLEASE DO IT!!! {{sticker:sg-lux}} 

That is the best SG Quinn skin concept I have seen. As the Avantel Wings said, not a big fan, but this is extraordinary.

> [{quoted}](name=HyperTechno,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2018-11-02T19:50:37.932+0000)
>
> YES PLEASE RIOT!!!!!  PLEASE DO IT!!! {{sticker:sg-lux}} 
> 
> That is the best SG Quinn skin concept I have seen. As the Avantel Wings said, not a big fan, but this is extraordinary.

I'm thinking the same !
I like it, except for the long hair. Quinn has short hair, with long hair she doesn't even look like Quinn.

next SG team {{champion:28}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:22}} 

please riot
ok at some point someone made a SG Leona now we have a SG quinn, 3 more and rito can justify making another set

> [{quoted}](name=Mcsquzzy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-11-02T02:17:06.329+0000)
>
> ok at some point someone made a SG Leona now we have a SG quinn, 3 more and rito can justify making another set

SG Leona /Diana need to happen alongside Quinn

has to much of a heartseeker vibe, try different variants of pink as the current one is too soft.
on other note the design looks exquisite (i like complicated words OK)

> [{quoted}](name=MrGerund,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2018-11-02T14:14:25.793+0000)
>
> has to much of a heartseeker vibe, try different variants of pink as the current one is too soft.
> on other note the design looks exquisite (i like complicated words OK)

I've realized it already haha.
67 Yes against 11 no. I think the vote say it all. I just wish Riot would now see this concept so we can make this come real. Our bird Lady deserve some love.
I litteraly just want a new Quinn skin and i'll take anything at this point.

> [{quoted}](name=Mario Kart 64,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2018-11-02T18:35:24.289+0000)
>
> I litteraly just want a new Quinn skin and i'll take anything at this point.

Hahaha i feel you on that
Thighigh on one leg but not the other is hnnngggg

> [{quoted}](name=Verxint,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-11-02T04:22:38.619+0000)
>
> Thighigh on one leg but not the other is hnnngggg

I know that's my main concern, she need thihigh on both legs.
I dunno, one bare and one covered is pretty great

Quinn is a member of my dream team for the next Star Guardian line, so I love this by default.
And it would be nice to have a Star Guardian with an extremely deep relationship with their familiar.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-02T01:18:36.759+0000)
>
> Quinn is a member of my dream team for the next Star Guardian line, so I love this by default.
> And it would be nice to have a Star Guardian with an extremely deep relationship with their familiar.

Exactly, most Star Guardian skin have a special link with their familiar and Quinn and Valor would suit the theme perfectly.
It's nice but idk, I think she needs less hair, looks a bit like SG Ahri and shorter hair might fit her character better.

> [{quoted}](name=The DrBonjigollo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-11-02T06:35:20.070+0000)
>
> It's nice but idk, I think she needs less hair, looks a bit like SG Ahri and shorter hair might fit her character better.

Well i like Quinn with short hair but having long hair for once make a change and i'm liking it this way.

> [{quoted}](name=Quinn Is Bae,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2018-11-02T16:43:49.505+0000)
>
> Well i like Quinn with short hair but having long hair for once make a change and i'm liking it this way.

lol then you do you, great skin regardless.
Oh nice

> [{quoted}](name=Noor Sakata,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-11-02T12:27:05.764+0000)
>
> Oh nice

I know right !
I love it, but we all know how Skirts work out on her model. AKa, they don't :(

> [{quoted}](name=Sexy Jack Rabbit,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-11-02T07:00:30.911+0000)
>
> I love it, but we all know how Skirts work out on her model. AKa, they don't :(
It can work as they are planning to update Quinn idle position in future.

Riot Roronation is updating her walking animation.

He specifically stated they won't be updating her Idle, as it's too much extra work.

> [{quoted}](name=Sexy Jack Rabbit,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2018-11-03T02:46:22.092+0000)
>
> Riot Roronation is updating her walking animation.
> 
> He specifically stated they won't be updating her Idle, as it's too much extra work.

Oh my bad then. Her running animation is fine for me tho.. Only her idle is lame right now.
I would pick up Quin for this skin
I love it.

Not bad at all, I'm pretty impressed. My one critique would be that I wish there was less going on with her skirt layering in the back, and a little more detail put instead into the legs, but in spite of that nitpick it's a really well-executed concept. Kudos to the artist.
I hope they won't make more of these cringe SG skins, they look too anime-weeby.

> [{quoted}](name=WoOxêr,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2018-11-02T07:56:06.810+0000)
>
> I hope they won't make more of these cringe SG skins, they look too anime-weeby.

Why you hate exactly ?
up
**_Now this, is epic._**
please more views!
This looks amazing but you know Riot would ruin it by giving her tights like they did with Heartseeker

> [{quoted}](name=Cancer Champ,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uh82asf5,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2018-11-03T10:25:50.076+0000)

> This looks amazing but you know Riot would ruin it by giving her tights like they did with Heartseeker
